instructions.1: Fill coffeemaker with water. Mix ground cinnamon with coffee and brew one pot.
instructions.2: While coffee is brewing, heat milk in microwave on low until warm.
instructions.3: Pour equal amounts of coffee into 6 mugs.
instructions.4: Add 1 teaspoon SPLENDA® Granulated Sweetener and 1/2 teaspoon cocoa to each mug. Mix well; top off with milk. Garnish with cinnamon sticks.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the coffee from Step 1 being used?
Is coffee from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is milk from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is coffeemaker from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to use the milk in Step 4?
Can we fill (Step 1) and pour (Step 3) at the same time?
